bibl.title: Sul frammento esametrico di ""partenio"" tràdito in P. Oxy. I 8.
bibl.note: As to language and subject, the fragmentary hexameters of P. Oxy. I, 8 (= M.-P.3 1889; LDAB 4463) recall choral lyric poetry; they were probably composed in the Hellenistic age. - Avec résumé en anglais.
bibl.seg: Luca Bettarini, Sul frammento esametrico di ""partenio"" tràdito in P. Oxy. I 8.

As to language and subject, the fragmentary hexameters of P. Oxy. I, 8 (= M.-P.3 1889; LDAB 4463) recall choral lyric poetry; they were probably composed in the Hellenistic age. - Avec résumé en anglais.
